North Korea: s announcement of shutting down its northern nuclear test site, as reported by its state news agency, was a significant aspect in verifying the claim of denuclearization.
Kim Jong Un: s promise to conduct no weapon or missile tests while talks were underway also supported the claim of North Korea's agreement to denuclearization.
South Korean President Moon Jae: in's statement about North Korea expressing its commitment to complete denuclearization added weight to the authenticity of the claim.
The fact that North Korea has yet to off: leaving it to other countries to put that possibility on the table, raises doubts about the complete verification of the claim.
